metadata.title: TamslDogam
metadata.description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons catalog web app — Filter by name, month, time, and hemisphere. Track caught items. Mobile optimized.
metadata.ogDescription: ACNH Catalog Web App — Name search, month/time selection (time travel), North/South hemisphere toggle, caught/remaining item management.
metadata.twitterDescription: ACNH catalog web app with name, month, time, and hemisphere filters. Mobile optimized, caught item tracking.

brand.title: TamslDogam
brand.subtitle: (탐슬도감)
brand.description: ACNH Catalog Web App — Filter by name, month, time, and hemisphere at once. Track caught items. Mobile optimized.
brand.screenshotHint: Add 1-2 screenshots from /og-image.png or actual screen captures.
brand.feature1: Name search (partial match), month/time selection (time travel), North/South hemisphere toggle
brand.feature2: Auto-organize caught items, remaining count per tab
brand.feature3: Mobile optimized, minimal ads (auth screen only)
brand.metaDescription: TamslDogam is an ACNH catalog web app supporting name, month, time, and hemisphere filters with caught/remaining item management.
brand.faqA1: TamslDogam is an ACNH catalog web app providing name, month, time, and hemisphere filters with caught/remaining item management.
brand.faqQ2: Does it support time travel and hemisphere switching?
brand.faqA2: Yes. It supports custom time settings (time travel) and North/South hemisphere toggle.
brand.faqQ3: Do I need to install an app or sign up?
brand.faqA3: You can use it directly in your browser. Core features are available without login.
